name: fv_arc_kill_04
text: Glad we could meet, mace to face.

name: fv_arc_kill_07
text: I foresaw your death the moment you were born.

text: Birth is a promise; death its fulfillment.

text_simple: the tests of time were too much for you

text: If the Acolytes couldn't stop me, what chance had you?

text: If only you could see all your choices that led to this.

text: I have seen the true terrors of the void. Do not call this an unkind fate.

name: fv_arc_level_06
text: Hmm hmm hmmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.
text_simple: hmm hmm hmmm hmm hmm hmm hmm

name: fv_arc_level_07
text: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Of course.
text_simple: hmm hmm hmm hmm of course

name: fv_arc_level_08
text: Hm hm hmm ha ha haaa. Yeesss.
text_simple: hm hm hmm ha ha haaa yeesss

name: fv_arc_level_09
text: Even Clasz himself need fear me.
text_simple: even clasz himself need fear me

name: fv_arc_level_10
text: To be an aspect of Clasz...is not enough.
text_simple: to be an aspect of clasz is not enough

name: fv_arc_level_11
text: I bide my time. And recruit wisely.
text_simple: i bide my time and recruit wisely

name: fv_arc_level_12
text: They think me a gateway. But I refuse.
text_simple: they think me a gateway but i refuse

name: fv_arc_level_13
text: My fate will not be written here.
text_simple: my fate will not be written here

name: fv_arc_level_14
text: This realm has much to offer.
text_simple: this realm has much to offer

name: fv_arc_level_15
text: I take power where I please.
text_simple: i take power where i please

name: fv_arc_lgcy_rare_01
text: Every day lived is a page of history.
text_simple: every day lived is a page of history

name: fv_arc_lgcy_rare_02
text: Time is a river with many eddies. I have seen its head waters, and I have seen its currents reach the sea.
text_simple: time is a river with many eddies i have seen its head waters and i have seen its currents reach the sea

name: fv_arc_lgcy_rare_03
text: I may be faceless, but I'm not maceless.
text_simple: i may be faceless but im not maceless

name: fv_arc_lose_03
text: Some things were just not meant to be.
text_simple: some things were just not meant to be

name: fv_arc_lose_04
text: The power of Clasz consumes me!
text_simple: the power of clasz consumes me

name: fv_arc_lose_06
text: And now this dimension will fall...
text_simple: and now this dimension will fall

name: fv_arc_maskmad_02
text: Ah, mask of madness, a perfect fit.
text_simple: ah mask of madness a perfect fit

name: fv_arc_mono_a_01
text: For one of my kind, initiation as an Acolyte of Clasz is the highest honor.
text_simple: for one of my kind initiation as an acolyte of clasz is the highest honor

name: fv_arc_mono_a_02
text: And I wore that mantle well.
text_simple: and i wore that mantle well

name: fv_arc_mono_a_03
text: Fully devoted to my future as an aspect of Clasz the Infinite.
text_simple: fully devoted to my future as an aspect of clasz the infinite

name: fv_arc_mono_a_04
text: Too naive to understand what such devotion truly means.
text_simple: too naive to understand what such devotion truly means

name: fv_arc_mono_a_05
text: But I learned. That I would lose myself entirely to His expanse.
text_simple: but i learned that i would lose myself entirely to his expanse

name: fv_arc_mono_a_06
text: And slowly my pride turned to spite and anger.
text_simple: and slowly my pride turned to spite and anger

name: fv_arc_mono_a_07
text: My focus changed from supplication to subversion.
text_simple: my focus changed from supplication to subversion

name: fv_arc_mono_a_08
text: From my position of influence, I began to recruit fresh Acolytes to a secret cause.
text_simple: from my position of influence i began to recruit fresh acolytes to a secret cause

name: fv_arc_mono_a_09
text: Some witting, others much less so.
text_simple: some witting others much less so

name: fv_arc_mono_a_10
text: But all working towards my will.
text_simple: but all working towards my will

name: fv_arc_mono_a_12
text: To keep my head above the surface of oblivion.
text_simple: to keep my head above the surface of oblivion

name: fv_arc_mono_a_13
text: And bend Clasz's own powers against the infinite one himself.
text_simple: and bend claszs own powers against the infinite one himself

name: fv_arc_mono_b_01
text: We who thrive in Claszureme exist outside of time.
text_simple: we who thrive in claszureme exist outside of time

name: fv_arc_mono_b_03
text: Our advancements are measured through study.
text_simple: our advancements are measured through study

name: fv_arc_mono_b_04
text: And the transformation of knowledge into power.
text_simple: and the transformation of knowledge into power

name: fv_arc_mono_b_05
text: When we look upon your realm, we cannot see our own futures as we can yours.
text_simple: when we look upon your realm we cannot see our own futures as we can yours

name: fv_arc_mono_b_06
text: But in study of the ripples and swirls of your flowing rivers...
text_simple: but in study of the ripples and swirls of your flowing rivers

name: fv_arc_mono_b_07
text: We might divine something of our own fates. Amongst the impossible voids that manifest between the streams.
text_simple: we might divine something of our own fates amongst the impossible voids that manifest between the streams

name: fv_arc_mono_c_01
text: Those in this pathetic realm should thank me.
text_simple: those in this pathetic realm should thank me

name: fv_arc_mono_c_02
text: My attempts at survival have kept barred a dire gate.
text_simple: my attempts at survival have kept barred a dire gate

name: fv_arc_mono_c_03
text: Were I to complete my transformation...
text_simple: were i to complete my transformation

name: fv_arc_mono_c_04
text: the full power of Clasz would flow through this form.
text_simple: the full power of clasz would flow through this form

name: fv_arc_mono_c_05
text: And your plane, and all you wriggling denizens, would forever cease to be.
text_simple: and your plane and all you wriggling denizens would forever cease to be

name: fv_arc_mono_d_01
text: For now, Clasz hunts. And I evade his expanse.
text_simple: for now clasz hunts and i evade his expanse

name: fv_arc_mono_d_02
text: I know to turn his tendrils against my own enemies.
text_simple: i know to turn his tendrils against my own enemies

name: fv_arc_mono_d_03
text: And those he devours in my stead briefly sate his need.
text_simple: and those he devours in my stead briefly sate his need

name: fv_arc_mono_d_04
text: But should I fail to provide worthy fodder...
text_simple: but should i fail to provide worthy fodder

name: fv_arc_mono_d_05
text: One shudders to imagine what my fate could be.
text_simple: one shudders to imagine what my fate could be

name: fv_arc_mono_e_01
text: We were not created by Clasz.
text_simple: we were not created by clasz

name: fv_arc_mono_e_02
text: Such efforts are alien to him.
text_simple: such efforts are alien to him

name: fv_arc_mono_e_03
text: We are mere lichen or fungus.
text_simple: we are mere lichen or fungus

name: fv_arc_mono_e_04
text: The Claszian Expanse provided the conditions, and we materialized to feast.
text_simple: the claszian expanse provided the conditions and we materialized to feast

name: fv_arc_mono_e_05
text: But now I take the next step.
text_simple: but now i take the next step

name: fv_arc_mono_e_06
text: I demand more than just a piece from Clasz.
text_simple: i demand more than just a piece from clasz

name: fv_arc_mono_e_07
text: I carve a swath, and I claim it for myself.
text_simple: i carve a swath and i claim it for myself

name: fv_arc_outpost_01
text: I light a beacon in the void.
text_simple: i light a beacon in the void

name: fv_arc_outpost_02
text: A small piece in the outcome of this war.
text_simple: a small piece in the outcome of this war

name: fv_arc_respawn_01
text: Like the sun, I rise again.
text_simple: like the sun i rise again

name: fv_arc_respawn_03
text: I have seen the end of time.
text_simple: i have seen the end of time

name: fv_arc_respawn_08
text: I returned to fulfill my destiny!
text_simple: i returned to fulfill my destiny

name: fv_arc_respawn_10
text: Time is a river with many eddies.
text_simple: time is a river with many eddies

name: fv_arc_respawn_11
text: My pendulum swings back to life.
text_simple: my pendulum swings back to life

name: fv_arc_respawn_12
text: I evade Clasz. Death holds no power over me.
text_simple: i evade clasz death holds no power over me

name: fv_arc_respawn_13
text: Sever one tendril and another will always replace it.
text_simple: sever one tendril and another will always replace it

name: fv_arc_respawn_14
text: I am a gateway that must remain closed.
text_simple: i am a gateway that must remain closed

name: fv_arc_respawn_16
text: I've grown to like it here.
text_simple: ive grown to like it here

name: fv_arc_respawn_17
text: I grow now like a weed. You cannot kill me.
text_simple: i grow now like a weed you cannot kill me

name: fv_arc_rival_001
text: Even the coldest mists dissipate in time.
text_simple: even the coldest mists dissipate in time

name: fv_arc_rival_003
text: I have little use for the pair of you.
text_simple: i have little use for the pair of you

name: fv_arc_rival_005
text: Much easier to dispatch you here.
text_simple: much easier to dispatch you here

name: fv_arc_rival_009
text: The ancient pales in the shadow of the infinite.
text_simple: the ancient pales in the shadow of the infinite

name: fv_arc_rival_011
text: A life without meaning meets merciful end.
text_simple: a life without meaning meets merciful end

name: fv_arc_rival_013
text: Dreams are fleeting. Death is not.
text_simple: dreams are fleeting death is not

name: fv_arc_rival_015
text: Fight or flight? You chose poorly.
text_simple: fight or flight you chose poorly

name: fv_arc_rival_017
text: The beasts will writhe before a new master.
text_simple: the beasts will writhe before a new master

name: fv_arc_rival_021
text: I need not hide my tracks from the likes of you.
text_simple: i need not hide my tracks from the likes of you

name: fv_arc_rival_023
text: Drunk on life, high on death.
text_simple: drunk on life high on death

name: fv_arc_rival_025
text: Be honored I waste words on you.
text_simple: be honored i waste words on you

name: fv_arc_rival_027
text: My tendrils are the only web this world needs.
text_simple: my tendrils are the only web this world needs

name: fv_arc_rival_029
text: You should have known your place was in the dirt.
text_simple: you should have known your place was in the dirt

name: fv_arc_rival_031
text: Even you are blind to your true intent.
text_simple: even you are blind to your true intent

name: fv_arc_rival_035
text: Here burns the endless pyre of Clinkz.
text_simple: here burns the endless pyre of clinkz

name: fv_arc_rival_037
text: What dents the armor liquifies the corpse.
text_simple: what dents the armor liquifies the corpse

name: fv_arc_rival_039
text: Even the winter warden withers in true cold.
text_simple: even the winter warden withers in true cold

name: fv_arc_rival_043
text: You cannot steal that which I allowed you to have.
text_simple: you cannot steal that which i allowed you to have

name: fv_arc_rival_044
text: You played your part unwittingly well.
text_simple: you played your part unwittingly well

name: fv_arc_rival_045
text: You still ponder the universe with a child's mind.
text_simple: you still ponder the universe with a childs mind

name: fv_arc_rival_048
text: Nothl is known to Clasz. As inconsequential.
text_simple: nothl is known to clasz as inconsequential

name: fv_arc_rival_049
text: Perhaps it will keep this time.
text_simple: perhaps it will keep this time

name: fv_arc_rival_051
text: Your mortal squabbles could never prepare you...for me.
text_simple: your mortal squabbles could never prepare you for me

name: fv_arc_rival_053
text: Your petulant needs count for nothing now.
text_simple: your petulant needs count for nothing now

name: fv_arc_rival_055
text: It will take a more impressive pairing than that to challenge me.
text_simple: it will take a more impressive pairing than that to challenge me

name: fv_arc_rival_059
text: Earth is little more than dust.
text_simple: earth is little more than dust

name: fv_arc_rival_061
text: I am not a pebble that trembles in your wake.
text_simple: i am not a pebble that trembles in your wake

name: fv_arc_rival_063
text: Why join these children in death?
text_simple: why join these children in death

name: fv_arc_rival_067
text: Nothing in your realm matters. Least of all some bags of meat.
text_simple: nothing in your realm matters least of all some bags of meat

name: fv_arc_rival_069
text: You were but a shadow of your true self...
text_simple: you were but a shadow of your true self

name: fv_arc_rival_073
text: Your transformation was an accident. Mine was well earned.
text_simple: your transformation was an accident mine was well earned

name: fv_arc_rival_077
text: Your little bones broke all too well.
text_simple: your little bones broke all too well

name: fv_arc_rival_079
text: It takes cunning to face me. You never had a chance.
text_simple: it takes cunning to face me you never had a chance

name: fv_arc_rival_081
text: If only I could harness your power, and face the might of Clasz.
text_simple: if only i could harness your power and face the might of clasz

name: fv_arc_rival_083
text: Your plans were transparent to me.
text_simple: your plans were transparent to me

name: fv_arc_rival_085
text: Twice the fool. In life and in death.
text_simple: twice the fool in life and in death

name: fv_arc_rival_089
text: None will kill Clasz but me.
text_simple: none will kill clasz but me
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: fv_arc_rival_091
text: Did you take me for a kraken?
text_simple: did you take me for a kraken

name: fv_arc_rival_093
text: Did you think me a demon, Tresdin? I'm something far worse.
text_simple: did you think me a demon tresdin im something far worse

name: fv_arc_rival_097
text: You think your days long, but here lies your end.
text_simple: you think your days long but here lies your end

name: fv_arc_rival_103
text: Your pathetic augmentation just wasn't enough.
text_simple: your pathetic augmentation just wasnt enough

name: fv_arc_rival_107
text: Next time bring Selemene to the fight. I'll kill her too.
text_simple: next time bring selemene to the fight ill kill her too

name: fv_arc_rival_109
text: You should never have crossed me.
text_simple: you should never have crossed me

name: fv_arc_rival_111
text: It was fun for a moment, but I grew weary.
text_simple: it was fun for a moment but i grew weary

name: fv_arc_rival_115
text: You don't even know why you fight.
text_simple: you dont even know why you fight

name: fv_arc_rival_117
text: How does this aid your sisters?
text_simple: how does this aid your sisters

name: fv_arc_rival_119
text: Cut off one head...and all the others die.
text_simple: cut off one head and all the others die

name: fv_arc_rival_121
text: Mercy is a game for children.
text_simple: mercy is a game for children

name: fv_arc_rival_123
text: Rest now. I'll defy the gods in your place.
text_simple: rest now ill defy the gods in your place

name: fv_arc_rival_124
text: You always were a fool, Wu Kong. But one with a glorious fate.
text_simple: you always were a fool wu kong but one with a glorious fate

name: fv_arc_rival_125
text: It seems you strayed away from a wiser path.
text_simple: it seems you strayed away from a wiser path

name: fv_arc_rival_127
text: Your kingdoms will meet the same fate.
text_simple: your kingdoms will meet the same fate

name: fv_arc_rival_129
text: Now much darker roots are set to grow...
text_simple: now much darker roots are set to grow

name: fv_arc_rival_131
text: If nothing else, I've done the world a favor.
text_simple: if nothing else ive done the world a favor

name: fv_arc_rival_139
text: Can your bedtime story save you now?
text_simple: can your bedtime story save you now

name: fv_arc_rival_141
text: You've seen much. From a limited perspective.
text_simple: youve seen much from a limited perspective

name: fv_arc_rival_142
text: Everything you've accomplished was already meant to be.
text_simple: everything youve accomplished was already meant to be

name: fv_arc_rival_143
text: Little more than a haggard dog.
text_simple: little more than a haggard dog

name: fv_arc_rival_145
text: Once void of purpose, now void of breath.
text_simple: once void of purpose now void of breath

name: fv_arc_rival_147
text: I was once like you. A pawn.
text_simple: i was once like you a pawn

name: fv_arc_rival_149
text: I have no time for phantoms. There are Ancients to kill.
text_simple: i have no time for phantoms there are ancients to kill

name: fv_arc_rival_151
text: Those aren't stars that shine in the void...
text_simple: those arent stars that shine in the void

name: fv_arc_rival_155
text: Best to deal with you before you know what you are.
text_simple: best to deal with you before you know what you are

name: fv_arc_rival_156
text: One less future to worry about.
text_simple: one less future to worry about

name: fv_arc_rival_157
text: But never to be rid of your carcass...
text_simple: but never to be rid of your carcass

name: fv_arc_rival_159
text: I don't have time for this.
text_simple: i dont have time for this

name: fv_arc_rival_161
text: I give you pain without end.
text_simple: i give you pain without end

name: fv_arc_rival_163
text: Your foolish masters will miss you.
text_simple: your foolish masters will miss you

name: fv_arc_rival_164
text: Better to die here in freedom than thrive as the 'master' of that maze.
text_simple: better to die here in freedom than thrive as the master of that maze

name: fv_arc_rival_165
text: I don't need to see you, fool.
text_simple: i dont need to see you fool

name: fv_arc_rival_171
text: Fear not. I'll slay your followers, too.
text_simple: fear not ill slay your followers too

name: fv_arc_rival_173
text: You were far too busy with trivial pursuits.
text_simple: you were far too busy with trivial pursuits

name: fv_arc_rival_175
text: I don't know you. And I don't care.
text_simple: i dont know you and i dont care

name: fv_arc_rival_177
text: Such hubris. This death was too good for you.
text_simple: such hubris this death was too good for you

name: fv_arc_rival_179
text: Your aims were small. I won't waste another thought on you.
text_simple: your aims were small i wont waste another thought on you

name: fv_arc_rival_181
text: You came of age on a playground.
text_simple: you came of age on a playground

name: fv_arc_rival_183
text: Never bring a knife to a god fight.
text_simple: never bring a knife to a god fight

name: fv_arc_rival_187
text: That clever toy can't save you.
text_simple: that clever toy cant save you

name: fv_arc_rival_193
text: So ends your flight of fancy.
text_simple: so ends your flight of fancy

name: fv_arc_rival_205
text: There aren't enough blades in this world.
text_simple: there arent enough blades in this world

name: fv_arc_rival_207
text: Do not pry into the affairs of Claszureme.
text_simple: do not pry into the affairs of claszureme

name: fv_arc_rival_213
text: I dare say he enjoyed eating my mace.
text_simple: i dare say he enjoyed eating my mace

name: fv_arc_rival_217
text: I think you missed your stop.
text_simple: i think you missed your stop

name: fv_arc_rival_219
text: I think nothing of the Dirge.
text_simple: i think nothing of the dirge

name: fv_arc_rival_223
text: Sell your sob story somewhere else.
text_simple: sell your sob story somewhere else

name: fv_arc_rival_225
text: It feels good to squish a worm.
text_simple: it feels good to squish a worm

name: fv_arc_rival_227
text: It seems I had the thicker skin.
text_simple: it seems i had the thicker skin

name: fv_arc_rival_229
text: And now a visage-less void as well.
text_simple: and now a visageless void as well

name: fv_arc_rival_231
text: To think I once feared you...
text_simple: to think i once feared you

name: fv_arc_rival_232
text: You have no power in that form.
text_simple: you have no power in that form

name: fv_arc_rival_233
text: No one will care to read about this.
text_simple: no one will care to read about this

name: fv_arc_rival_235
text: You could have been useful, but my plans have never relied upon you.
text_simple: you could have been useful but my plans have never relied upon you

name: fv_arc_rival_237
text: So falls the wind that rises.
text_simple: so falls the wind that rises

name: fv_arc_rival_239
text: At last we've cured your disease.
text_simple: at last weve cured your disease

name: fv_arc_rival_245
text: The wrong side of a familiar coin...
text_simple: the wrong side of a familiar coin

name: fv_arc_spawn_02
text: I have seen how this war ends.
text_simple: i have seen how this war ends

name: fv_arc_spawn_04
text: From a place beyond time, and time beyond counting.
text_simple: from a place beyond time and time beyond counting

name: fv_arc_spawn_06
text: What Clasz surrendered, I refuse to let go.
text_simple: what clasz surrendered i refuse to let go

name: fv_arc_spawn_07
text: I steal strength from the Claszian expanse.
text_simple: i steal strength from the claszian expanse

name: fv_arc_spawn_08
text: Should I fall so too shall all of you.
text_simple: should i fall so too shall all of you

name: fv_arc_spawn_09
text: I alone hold back the flood of Clasz.
text_simple: i alone hold back the flood of clasz

name: fv_arc_spawn_10
text: Time enough to learn what I need.
text_simple: time enough to learn what i need

name: fv_arc_spawn_13
text: I move freely amongst those shackled by fate.
text_simple: i move freely amongst those shackled by fate

text: A low moment on my higher path.

name: fv_arc_teleport_pain_02
text: Better than calling in a favor...
text_simple: better than calling in a favor
criteria: CastExecute Isfaceless_void IsVoidClasz IsFacelessTeleport IsSpeechPain Chance_50%
pretty_criteria: Casting an ability Town Portal Scroll IsSpeechPain (50% chance)

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_01
text: You're going to have a bad time.
text_simple: youre going to have a bad time

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_02
text: A moment for me. Eternity for you.
text_simple: a moment for me eternity for you

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_04
text: Your mind is a flat circle.
text_simple: your mind is a flat circle

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_05
text: I saw your death coming and I still enjoyed it.
text_simple: i saw your death coming and i still enjoyed it

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_06
text: All of your sand is in the bottom of the glass.
text_simple: all of your sand is in the bottom of the glass

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_09
text: You were always destined to die.
text_simple: you were always destined to die

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_10
text: If only I could see the look on your face...
text_simple: if only i could see the look on your face

name: fv_arc_wheel_all_11
text: A waste of time and space.
text_simple: a waste of time and space

name: fv_arc_wheel_deny_01
text: Does this look like a face that cares?
text_simple: does this look like a face that cares

name: fv_arc_wheel_deny_02
text: If only you could turn back time...
text_simple: if only you could turn back time

name: fv_arc_wheel_laugh_03
text: Ahhh ha ha ha ha ha haaa!
text_simple: ahhh ha ha ha ha ha haaa

name: fv_arc_wheel_thanks_01
text: Gratitude would imply you had free will.
text_simple: gratitude would imply you had free will

name: fv_arc_wheel_thanks_02
text: I have no use for decorum.
text_simple: i have no use for decorum

name: fv_arc_wheel_thanks_03
text: Grace means nothing in the void.
text_simple: grace means nothing in the void

name: fv_arc_win_04
text: The power to destroy Clasz will set me free.
text_simple: the power to destroy clasz will set me free

name: fv_arc_win_05
text: Now to destroy Clasz...and claim His expanse.
text_simple: now to destroy clasz and claim his expanse
